Text:
It was under the ‘sampige’ - 
 The fragrant champa tree
 That I waited for Ajji 
 To walk me home. 
 All along I’d ask her - 
 Neer dosa? Allugeda? Bhaath? 
 She’d simply shrug 
 Smiling indulgently

All along I’d ask her - 
 Neer dosa? Allugeda? Bhaath? 
 She’d simply shrug 
 Smiling indulgently. 
 Lunch was a glorious affair

My joyous feet dangling. 
 Eyes hungry, mouth watering. 
 Awaiting Ajji’s spread 
 The whole recipe

Next steps, videos. 
 Even Ajji’s jokes. 
 Are now online to see

It is a happy story. 
 I am glad I'm on the same wavelength. 
 If it's not, let's find another path.

I am hungry with longing. 
 It's all around me. 
 This is Ajji’s world. 
 To me, it's all there is

When the hunger gets too much. 
 No, it should be just a meal. 
 To be eaten. 
 I wish I was in Ajji’s world
DO: Simple Math: Helping someone adds to joy!
